/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy day in the city. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, are punctuated with occasional red and blue accents, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
